body:
Do you want NBA Power Rankings from a professional sports betting model? Then you're in the right place. Far more accurate than any NBA journo or content marketing kid, these NBA Power Rankings are created by a market beating Model. You won't see it get carried away by a few good games or some lucky momentum. It's emotionless and objective. We'll update the NBA Power Rankings every week. - - - ## **NBA Power Rankings** ![NCAAB Basketball Rankings](/images/uploads/ncaab-power-rankings-1.png "NCAAB Basketball Rankings") ![NCAAB Basketball Rankings](/images/uploads/ncaab-power-rankings-2.png "NCAAB Basketball Rankings") ![NCAAB Basketball Rankings](/images/uploads/ncaab-power-rankings-3.png "NCAAB Basketball Rankings") ![NCAAB Basketball Rankings](/images/uploads/ncaab-power-rankings-4.png "NCAAB Basketball Rankings") What does the Rating mean? The Gonzaga Bulldogs are 25.31 points better than average. That means, they should start -25 against a school like Navy, with a zero point Rating. On a neutral venue. The Rating doesn't include home ground advantage either. How many points is Cameron Indoor Stadium worth to Duke pre-Covid? You would add that on top of the Rating. - - - ## **NCAAB Basketball Rankings Commentary** Coming soon. - - - ### **Want more insight? Join the weekly email.** ### **We promise it's worth your time.** ### **
**
